trans-unit.source: Displays a set of text or image hyperlinks that enable users to more easily navigate a Web site, while taking a minimal amount of page space.
trans-unit.target: Viser et sett med text- eller image hyperkoblinger som lar brukerne enklere å navigere et webområde, mens du tar minimalt med plass for side.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Nodes](#nodes) - [Node Appearance](#node_appearance) - [Events](#events) - [Customizing the SiteMapPath Control](#customizing_the_sitemappath_control) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The SiteMapPath control is a site navigation control that reflects data provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [noder](#nodes) - [noden utseendet](#node_appearance) - [hendelser](#events) - [tilpasse SiteMapPath-kontroll](#customizing_the_sitemappath_control) - [tilgjengelighet](#accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#declarative_syntax) ## innføring i SiteMapPath kontrollen er en kontroll for navigasjon av området som viser data fra den objektet.

trans-unit.source: It provides a space-saving way to easily navigate a site and serves as a point of reference for where the currently displayed page is within a site.
trans-unit.target: Den gjør spare plass til å navigere på et nettsted og fungerer som et punkt referanse for der den viste siden er innenfor et område.

trans-unit.source: This type of control is commonly called a breadcrumb, or eyebrow, because it displays a hierarchical path of hyperlinked page names that provides an escape up the hierarchy of pages from the current location.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen kontroll kalles vanligvis en brødsmulen eller eyebrow, fordi det vises en hierarkisk bane for hyperkobling sidenavn som inneholder en dobbeltkonvertering hierarkiet med sider fra gjeldende plassering.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapPath is useful for sites that have deep hierarchical page structures, but where a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> might require too much space on a page.
trans-unit.target: SiteMapPath er nyttig for områder som har dyp hierarkisk siden strukturer, men hvor en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>kan kreve for mye diskplass på en side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapPath control works directly with your Web site's site map data.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen SiteMapPath fungerer direkte med til webområdet kartdata for området.

trans-unit.source: If you use it on a page that is not represented in your site map, it will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker den på en side som ikke er representert i områdekartet, vil den ikke vises.

trans-unit.source: For more information about site maps, see [ASP.NET Site Navigation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om områdekart [ASP.NET områdenavigasjon](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Nodes The SiteMapPath is made up of nodes.
trans-unit.target: ## Noder i SiteMapPath består av noder.

trans-unit.source: Each element in the path is called a node and is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvert element i banen kalles en node og representeres av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: The node that anchors the path and represents the base of the hierarchical tree is called the root node.
trans-unit.target: Noden som forankrer banen og representerer grunntallet hierarkisk treet kalles rotnoden.

trans-unit.source: The node that represents the currently displayed page is the current node.
trans-unit.target: Noden som representerer den viste siden er den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: Any other node between the current node and root node is a parent node.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre noder mellom den gjeldende noden og rotnode er en overordnet node.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the three different node types.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver de tre annen node-typene.

trans-unit.source: |Node type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |root|A node that anchors a hierarchical set of nodes.| |parent|A node that has one or more child nodes, but is not the current node.| |current|A node that represents the currently displayed page.| ## Node Appearance Each node displayed by a SiteMapPath is a or control that you can apply a template or style to.
trans-unit.target: | Nodetypen | Beskrivelse | |---------------|-----------------| | roten | En node som forankrer et hierarkisk sett med noder. | | overordnede | En node som har én eller flere underordnede noder, men er ikke den gjeldende noden. | | gjeldende | En node som representerer den viste siden. | ## Noden utseendet hvert noden vises av en SiteMapPath er en eller kontroll du kan bruke en mal eller style til.

trans-unit.source: The templates and styles are applied to nodes according to two rules of precedence: - If a template is defined for a node, it overrides any style defined for the node.
trans-unit.target: Malene og stiler brukes til noder i henhold til to regler for prioritet:-Hvis en mal er definert for en node, den overstyrer en mal som er angitt for noden.

trans-unit.source: - Templates and styles that are specific to types of nodes override general templates and styles defined for all nodes.
trans-unit.target: -Overstyrer generelle maler og stiler som er definert for alle noder maler og stiler som er spesifikke for typer noder.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> properties are applied to all nodes, regardless of their node type.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>Egenskaper brukes på alle noder, uavhengig av deres nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both these properties are defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge disse egenskapene er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> properties are applied to nodes that represent the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>Egenskaper som er knyttet til noder som representerer den viste siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> is defined in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>er definert i tillegg til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>, ignoreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> is defined in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>, it is merged with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> to create a merged style.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>er definert i tillegg til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>, den er slått sammen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>til å opprette en sammenslått stil.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This merged style uses all the elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>, plus any additional elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> that do not conflict with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne sammenslåtte stilen bruker alle elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>, pluss noen flere elementer i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>som ikke er i konflikt med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> properties are applied to the node that represents the root of the site navigation hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>Egenskaper brukes på noden som representerer roten av området navigasjonshierarkiet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> is defined in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>er definert i tillegg til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>, ignoreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> is defined in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, it is merged with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> to create a merged style.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>er definert i tillegg til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, den er slått sammen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>til å opprette en sammenslått stil.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This merged style uses all the elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, plus any additional elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> that did not conflict with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne sammenslåtte stilen bruker alle elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, pluss noen flere elementer i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>som ikke er i konflikt med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, if the currently displayed page is the root page of the site, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> are used instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt hvis den viste siden siden roten for området til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>brukes i stedet for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapPath control uses the site map provider identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A> property as its data source for site navigation information.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen SiteMapPath bruker området kartet leverandøren identifisert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A>egenskapen som datakilde for informasjon om området navigering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no provider is specified, it uses the default provider for the site, identified in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Provider%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen leverandør er angitt, brukes standardleverandøren for området som er identifisert i den <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Provider%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Provider%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is an instance of the default site map provider for ASP.NET, the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Dette er vanligvis en forekomst av standardleverandøren for kartet for ASP.NET, <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>.</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: If the SiteMapPath control is used within a site but no site map provider is configured, the control throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SiteMapPath kontrollen brukes innenfor et område, men ingen området kartet leverandøren er konfigurert, kontrollen oppstår en <xref:System.Web.HttpException>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: ## Events The SiteMapPath control also provides events that you can program against.
trans-unit.target: ## Hendelser SiteMapPath kontrollen gir deg også hendelser som du kan programmer mot.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kjører en egendefinert rutine når det oppstår en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events supported by the SiteMapPath control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser som støttes av SiteMapPath-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||Occurs when the SiteMapPath control first creates a and associates it with a .| ||Occurs when a is bound to site map data contained by the .| ## Customizing the SiteMapPath Control Classes that derive from SiteMapPath override the method to customize the controls contained by the navigation control.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | | Forekommer når kontrollen SiteMapPath først oppretter en og knyttes til en . | | | Forekommer når en er bundet til området kartdata finnes i . | ## Tilpasse SiteMapPath kontrollen klasser som er avledet fra SiteMapPath overstyring av metode for å tilpasse den Kontroller av navigasjonskontrollen for.

trans-unit.source: For complete control over the way <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects are created and added to the SiteMapPath, derived classes override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For full kontroll over måten <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>objekter opprettes og legges til i SiteMapPath, avledede klasser overstyring av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                             ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```                                                                                                             ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control to a page, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> object, set its properties, and then add it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of a container control such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>.
trans-unit.target: Legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontroll på en side, Opprett en ny <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>objekt, angi egenskapene for og deretter legge den til <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen for en beholderkontroll for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> dynamisk

trans-unit.source: Clears the current child controls collection, and rebuilds it by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy*> method.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner gjeldende underordnede kontroller samling, og bygger den på nytt ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the ASP.NET infrastructure to notify any controls that use composition-based implementation, including controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl> to create any child controls they contain in preparation for postback or rendering.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av ASP.NET-infrastruktur for å varsle andre kontroller som bruker sammensetningen implementeringen, inkludert kontroller som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl>til å opprette en underordnet Kontroller de inneholder under forberedelsene for tilbakesending eller gjengivelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Examines the site map structure provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider*> and builds a child controls collection based on the styles and templates defined for the functional nodes.
trans-unit.target: Undersøker området kartet strukturen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider*>og bygger et barn kontrollsamlingen basert på malene og maler som er definert for funksjonsområdet nodene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider*>

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlHierarchy method creates <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> controls, associates them with the corresponding <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects from the current site map provider, and adds the nodes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlHierarchy oppretter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>kontrollerer, knyttes den tilsvarende <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objekter fra gjeldende område kartleverandør, og legger til noder som den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: The method begins by finding the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.CurrentNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and then walks up the hierarchical tree of <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> for each one until the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.RootNode%2A> is reached.
trans-unit.target: Metoden starter ved å finne den <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.CurrentNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, hjelper deg hierarkisk treet for <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>lage en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>for hvert av dem. før den <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.RootNode%2A>er nådd.</xref:System.Web.SiteMap.RootNode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMap.CurrentNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created, but before it is bound to its corresponding <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Etter hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>er opprettet, men før den er bundet til den tilhørende <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method applies any templates or styles defined for a particular node type and creates and initializes any child controls that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> contains.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>metoden gjelder alle maler eller stiler som er definert for en bestemt nodetype oppretter og initialiserer alle underordnede kontrollerer som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>inneholder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method adds the child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>metoden legger til underordnede kontroller av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is initialized, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Etter hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>er initialisert i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is bound to its corresponding <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataBound%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Vil <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>er bundet til den tilhørende <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataBound%2A>kalles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataBound%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlHierarchy method is called from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateChildControls%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlHierarchy kalles fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateChildControls%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateChildControls%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes that extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control override the CreateControlHierarchy method to alter how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> controls are created or added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontrollen Overstyr CreateControlHierarchy-metoden til å endre hvordan <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>Kontroller opprettes eller legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>

trans-unit.source: The manipulation of individual node items is performed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method, and most classes that extend <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> override that method only.
trans-unit.target: Manipulering av individuelle noden elementer utføres i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>metoden og de fleste klasser som utvide <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>overstyre denne metoden bare.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: No <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider*> is available to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ikke <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider*>er tilgjengelig for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the style used for the display text for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen for teksten for den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: Use the CurrentNodeStyle property to control the appearance of the display text for the navigation path node that represents the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen CurrentNodeStyle for å kontrollere utseendet til teksten som vises for navigasjon banen noden som representerer den viste siden.

trans-unit.source: By default, the display text is that specified in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that represents the page.
trans-unit.target: Som standard teksten er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>som representerer siden.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingene for vanlige inkludere egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge, skriftegenskaper og noden avstand.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: For <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>noder stilegenskaper slås sammen til én mal, i denne rekkefølgen: 1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>2.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: CurrentNodeStyle or, if the currently displayed page is the root node, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: CurrentNodeStyle eller, hvis den viste siden rotnoden, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angir skriftstilen node til en gjennomstreking eller overline stil, understreking standardstilen på noden vises ikke hvis det er eksplisitt satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> property is defined, the CurrentNodeStyle property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>er definert, CurrentNodeStyle-egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the style settings for the display text for the current node of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder stilinnstillingene for for teksten for den gjeldende noden for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a control template to use for the node of a site navigation path that represents the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en kontroll-malen som skal brukes for noden for en området navigasjon bane som representerer den viste siden.

trans-unit.source: Set the CurrentNodeTemplate to an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control or some other control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, as the current node's user interface element instead of a string.
trans-unit.target: Sett av CurrentNodeTemplate til en <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>objekt for å bruke en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>kontroll eller andre kontrollere, for eksempel en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, som den gjeldende noden element i brukergrensesnittet i stedet for en streng.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: If the CurrentNodeTemplate property is set, the template overrides both the current navigation node text displayed and any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> applied to it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CurrentNodeTemplate-egenskapen er angitt, overstyrer malen gjeldende navigasjon noden teksten vises og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>brukes til det.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the currently displayed page corresponds to the root node, however, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den viste siden tilsvarer rotnoden, men den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can declaratively set the CurrentNodeTemplate property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen CurrentNodeTemplate deklarativt til noen webkontrollen for server, og ASP.NET-infrastruktur utfører de nødvendige trinnene hvis du vil bryte server webkontroll som en <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: However, Web server controls do not implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface; therefore, when you work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> properties programmatically, you must write an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper for any template code.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid server webkontroller ikke implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>grensesnittet; derfor når du arbeider med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>Egenskaper programmatisk, må du skrive en <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>wrapper for en kode.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: Then, the CurrentNodeTemplate property is set to an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper.
trans-unit.target: Deretter CurrentNodeTemplate-egenskapen er satt til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>wrapper.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn*> method, to render custom content for the navigation path node that represents the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn*>metode for å vise egendefinert innhold for navigasjon banen noden som representerer den viste siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn*>

trans-unit.source: Binds a data source to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> control and its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Binding til en datakilde for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> kontroll og de underordnede-kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control is designed to retrieve its data directly from a site map provider by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.Provider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontrollen er utformet for å hente data direkte fra en leverandør for tilordning av område ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.Provider%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.Provider%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control to bind to ASP.NET data source controls, and do not call the DataBind method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Ikke bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontrollere for å binde til ASP.NET kilde kontroller, og ikke kalle metoden Databinde eksplisitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref>, which is a Web server control that represents a <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>, with a set of child controls based on the node's function and the specified templates and styles for the node.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"> </xref>, som er en kontroll for Web-server som representerer en <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref>, med et sett med underordnede kontroller basert på nodens funksjonen og angitte maler og stiler for noden.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeItem method determines the functional type of node that the item represents by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>, and applies any templates or styles that are defined for that kind of node.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeItem bestemmer hvilken funksjonsområdet av noden som representerer elementet ved å kontrollere de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>, og gjelder alle maler eller stiler som er definert for denne typen noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> item type, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> child control is created, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> may be applied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>har en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>elementtype, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>underordnede kontrollen er opprettet, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>kan brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> is set, its <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> is applied to the node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>brukes til noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: In instead the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> is set, it is merged with any defined <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> and applied.
trans-unit.target: I i stedet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>er angitt, den er slått sammen med alle definerte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>og tas i bruk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, if no templates or styles are defined, a basic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is created and initialized with values from the node.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt, hvis ingen maler eller stiler er definert, en basic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>kontrollen opprettes og klargjøres med verdier fra noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> item type, either a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> child control is created, depending on the return value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RenderCurrentNodeAsLink%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>er en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>elementtype, enten en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>underordnet kontroll er opprettet, avhengig av verdien som returneres av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RenderCurrentNodeAsLink%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RenderCurrentNodeAsLink%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: Then either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> may be applied.
trans-unit.target: Deretter enten den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>kan brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> is set, its <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> is applied to the node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>brukes til noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If instead the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> is set, it is merged with any defined <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> and applied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis i stedet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>er angitt, den er slått sammen med alle definerte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>og tas i bruk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> item type, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> child control is created and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> may be applied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>har en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>elementtype, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>underordnede kontrollen er opprettet og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>kan brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> is set, its <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> is applied to the node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>brukes til noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If instead the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> is set, it is applied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis i stedet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>er angitt, brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> item type, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> child control is created and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> are applied according to the same general rules defined for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> node type.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>har en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>elementtype, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>underordnede kontrollen er opprettet og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>, brukes i samme generelle regler som er definert for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: Override the InitializeItem method to manipulate individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr InitializeItem-metoden til å redigere enkelte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: If the design of the class requires more extensive control over how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects are created and added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis utformingen av klassen krever mer omfattende kontroll over hvordan <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>objekter opprettes og legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontrollere, eller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> is created by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> and is associated with its corresponding <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"> </xref> er opprettet ved hjelp av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> og er tilknyttet den tilhørende <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated*> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> has been bound to its underlying <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> data by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"> </xref> er bundet til den underliggende <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref> data ved den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound*> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous request that was saved with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon fra en tidligere forespørsel ble lagret med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SaveViewState*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av .NET Framework-infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoadViewState%2A> method restores the view-state information saved during a previous request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoadViewState%2A>metoden gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjonen lagres i løpet av en tidligere forespørsel.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer tilstanden kontrollen skal gjenopprettes.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the style used for the display text for all nodes in the site navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen for teksten som vises for alle noder på området navigasjon banen.

trans-unit.source: Use the NodeStyle property to control the appearance of the display text for all navigation path nodes rendered by the control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen NodeStyle for å kontrollere utseendet til teksten som vises for alle navigasjon banen noder gjengis av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the display text is that specified in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that represents the page.
trans-unit.target: Som standard teksten er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>som representerer siden.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingene for vanlige inkludere egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge, skriftegenskaper og noden avstand.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: For <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>noder stilegenskaper slås sammen til én mal, i denne rekkefølgen: 1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>

trans-unit.source: NodeStyle 2.
trans-unit.target: NodeStyle 2.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, avhengig av nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angir skriftstilen node til en gjennomstreking eller overline stil, understreking standardstilen på noden vises ikke hvis det er eksplisitt satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: If the NodeStyle is defined, it is initially applied to each node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis NodeStyle er angitt, brukes den opprinnelig på hver node.

trans-unit.source: If an additional style is defined for a particular type of node, such as the root node or current node, this style supersedes the general style specified in the NodeStyle property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en ekstra stilen er angitt for en bestemt type noden, for eksempel rotnode eller gjeldende noden erstatter denne stilen generelle stilen angitt i egenskapen NodeStyle.

trans-unit.source: If a template is defined for a particular type of node, it supersedes all defined styles for that node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en mal er definert for en bestemt type node, erstatter alle definerte stiler for denne noden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the style settings for the display text in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder stilinnstillingene for for teksten som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a control template to use for all functional nodes of a site navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en kontroll-malen som skal brukes for alle funksjonsområdet noder på en området navigasjon bane.

trans-unit.source: Set the NodeTemplate to an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> or some other control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, as a user interface element for all navigation path nodes.
trans-unit.target: Sett av NodeTemplate til en <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>objekt for å bruke en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>eller annet kontrollere, for eksempel en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, som et element i brukergrensesnittet for alle navigasjon banen noder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: If the NodeTemplate property is set, the template overrides both the navigation node text displayed and any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> applied to it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis NodeTemplate-egenskapen er angitt, overstyrer malen navigasjon noden teksten vises og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>brukes til det.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the current and root nodes, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> is set, these templates override the NodeTemplate.
trans-unit.target: For gjeldende og rotmappen noder Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>er angitt, disse malene overstyre NodeTemplate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can declaratively set the NodeTemplate property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen NodeTemplate deklarativt til noen webkontrollen for server, og ASP.NET-infrastruktur utfører de nødvendige trinnene hvis du vil bryte server webkontroll som en <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: However, Web server controls do not implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface; therefore, when you work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> properties programmatically, you must write an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper for any template code.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid server webkontroller ikke implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>grensesnittet; derfor når du arbeider med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>Egenskaper programmatisk, må du skrive en <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>wrapper for en kode.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> property is set to an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper.
trans-unit.target: Deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>er satt til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>wrapper.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn*> method, to render custom content for each node of a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> objekt som implementerer <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn*>metode for å vise egendefinert innhold for hver enkelt node i en navigeringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding*> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl"></xref> class and raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding*>metoden for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl"> </xref> klassen og hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding"> </xref> hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated> event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>, which is a Web server control that represents a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, and associates it to a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontrollen oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>, som er en kontroll for Web-server som representerer en <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, knyttes til en <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: The OnItemCreated method is called before the created node item is bound to its data.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemCreated kalles før opprettet node-elementet er bundet til dataene.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnItemCreated method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemCreated kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control binds to the data provided by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound>denne hendelsen oppstår når <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontrollen bindes til data som er angitt av sin <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel oppdatere en database eller viste innhold når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnItemDataBound method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemDataBound kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of levels of parent nodes the control displays, relative to the currently displayed node.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antallet nivåer i overordnede noder viser kontrollen, i forhold til noden som vises for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: The ParentLevelsDisplayed property governs how many levels of parent nodes are displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control above the current context node.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ParentLevelsDisplayed styrer hvor mange nivåer med overordnede noder vises ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontroll over kontekstnoden for gjeldende.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>

trans-unit.source: By default, all parent and ancestor nodes above the current context node are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vises alle overordnede og overordnet noder over kontekstnoden for gjeldende.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the number of levels of parent nodes displayed, relative to the current context node.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir antall nivåer i overordnede noder som vises i forhold til den gjeldende kontekstnoden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates no restriction on the number of parent levels that the control displays.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er -1, som angir uten begrensninger på antall overordnede nivåer som viser kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The value for ParentLevelsDisplayed is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for ParentLevelsDisplayed er mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the order that the navigation path nodes are rendered in.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir rekkefølgen som navigasjon banen nodene gjengis i.

trans-unit.source: Set PathDirection to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection> if you want to display the navigation path from left to right; the navigation path appears as a progression from left to right of site map nodes.
trans-unit.target: Angi PathDirection <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection>Hvis du vil vise navigasjon banen fra venstre mot høyre; navigasjon banen vises som en fremdrift fra venstre til høyre for området kartet noder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection>

trans-unit.source: In other words, the root node is at the leftmost position, each subsequent node is in the next position to the right, and the current node is in the rightmost position.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord rotnoden er lengst til venstre, hver etterfølgende node er neste plassert til høyre og den gjeldende noden er lengst.

trans-unit.source: Set PathDirection to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection> if you want to display the navigation path from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Angi PathDirection <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection>Hvis du vil vise navigasjon banen fra høyre mot venstre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection>

trans-unit.source: In other words, the node order is reversed so that the root node displays at the rightmost position and the current node displays at the leftmost position.
trans-unit.target: Node-rekkefølgen reverseres med andre ord, slik at rotnoden viser lengst og den gjeldende noden viser lengst til venstre.

trans-unit.source: While not as common, this ordering can be used for localizing Web Forms pages and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control for languages that read from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Under ikke som felles, denne sortering kan brukes for lokalisering webskjema sider og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>kontroll språk som leses fra høyre mot venstre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"></xref> that indicates the hierarchical order that navigation nodes are rendered in.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"> </xref> som angir hierarki navigasjonsnoder gjengis i.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"></xref>, which indicates that the nodes are rendered in hierarchical order from the top-most node to the current node, from left to right.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"> </xref>, noe som angir at nodene gjengis i hierarkisk rekkefølge fra den øverste noden til den gjeldende noden fra venstre mot høyre.

trans-unit.source: The value for PathDirection is not one of the base <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"></xref> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for PathDirection er ikke én av grunntallet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"> </xref> opplistingene.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that delimits <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> nodes in the rendered navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir strengen som avgrenser <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> nodene i den gjengitte navigasjon-banen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> is defined, it is applied to the PathSeparator property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>er angitt, brukes den på egenskapen PathSeparator.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> property is defined, both the PathSeparator and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>er definert, både PathSeparator og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>ignoreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the delimiter for the nodes in a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer skilletegn for nodene i en navigasjon-bane.

trans-unit.source: The default is " > ", which is a character pointing from left to right, and corresponds to the default <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"></xref>, which is set to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard " > ", som er en peker fra venstre mot høyre tegnet, og tilsvarer standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"> </xref>, som er angitt som <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator*> string.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator*>streng.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator*>

trans-unit.source: Use the PathSeparatorStyle property to control the appearance of the path separator that appears between navigation path nodes.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen PathSeparatorStyle for å kontrollere utseendet til baneskiller som vises mellom navigasjon banen noder.

trans-unit.source: Common style settings include font properties and a foreground color for the font used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingene for vanlige inkluderer skriftegenskaper og en forgrunnsfarge for skriften som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> property is defined, both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> and PathSeparatorStyle properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>er definert, både av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>og PathSeparatorStyle ignoreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the style settings of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator*> text.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder stilinnstillingene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath"> </xref> kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator*>tekst.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a control template to use for the path delimiter of a site navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en kontroll-malen som skal brukes for banen skilletegn for en området navigasjon bane.

trans-unit.source: Set the PathSeparatorTemplate to an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> or some other control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, as the path delimiter between navigation nodes instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> string.
trans-unit.target: Sett av PathSeparatorTemplate til en <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>objekt for å bruke en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>eller annet kontrollere, for eksempel en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, som banen skilletegn mellom navigasjonsnoder i stedet for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>streng.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: If the PathSeparatorTemplate property is set, the template overrides both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> text displayed and any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> applied to it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis PathSeparatorTemplate-egenskapen er angitt, overstyrer malen både til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>tekst som vises, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>brukes til det.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can declaratively set the PathSeparatorTemplate property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen PathSeparatorTemplate deklarativt til noen webkontrollen for server, og ASP.NET-infrastruktur utfører de nødvendige trinnene hvis du vil bryte server webkontroll som <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: However, Web server controls do not implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface; therefore, when you work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> properties programmatically, you must write an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper for any template code.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid server webkontroller ikke implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>grensesnittet; derfor når du arbeider med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>Egenskaper programmatisk, må du skrive en <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>wrapper for en kode.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: Then, the PathSeparatorTemplate property is set to an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper.
trans-unit.target: Deretter PathSeparatorTemplate-egenskapen er satt til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>wrapper.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn*> method, to render custom content for the path delimiter of a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> objekt som implementerer <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn*>metode for å vise egendefinert innhold for banen skilletegn for en navigeringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that is associated with the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> som er knyttet til server-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Provider property specifies an instance of a site map provider to use with the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir en forekomst av en leverandør for område kartet til å bruke med kontrollen.
